actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: To amend the joint resolution of June 22, 1942, to provide for the reading of a Tribute to the Flag before the Pledge of Allegiance.

summary.text: Amends provisions of Federal law concerning rules and customs pertaining to the display of the flag of the United States to provide for the optional reading of a tribute to the U.S. flag before the Pledge of Allegiance.

titles.title: To amend the joint resolution of June 22, 1942, to provide for the reading of a Tribute to the Flag before the Pledge of Allegiance.
